news.title: Launching our social-media application YAARI- where 'यारी' meets 'दोस्ती'.

Successfully published my paper titled 'Advanced Brain Tumor Segmentation Using SAM2-UNet.' This paper focuses on leveraging the SAM2-UNet model for advanced segmentation of brain tumors, improving the accuracy and efficiency of detecting and delineating tumor regions in medical imaging.

Successfully published my paper titled 'Breaking the Fake: A CNN-BiLSTM Approach for Fake News Detection on Social Media.' It explores using Convolutional Neural Networks and Bi-directional LSTM networks to tackle the challenge of fake news detection on social media platforms.

Attended 2025 IEEE 15th Annual Computing and Communication Workshop and Conference (CCWC) at UNIVERSITY OF NEVADA, LAS VEGAS, USA (Online) to present our research paper on Breaking the Fake: a CNN-BiLSTM Approach for Fake News Detection on Social Media (1571097654), funding has been secured from Dr. Chen chair in the CS dept of the TTU
Launching our Ed-tech portal, ITTacademy. A place to start your programming journey!!
The abbreviation of VEDA 2.0, 'Very Easy Development Architecture'
Defined a 4096-B O(1) Generic Virtual Memory along with CFMA technology, this is a memory foundation for storing data (variables & objects).
The department of PLD has decided to migrate the interpreter from Java to C, for effective code execution.
Announcing a new programming langugage 'GARUDA' - Generating Assembly Resources Using Direct Algebra (Compiler based)
